001package edu.cnm.deepdive.appstarter.viewmodel;
002
003import android.content.Context;
004import androidx.lifecycle.DefaultLifecycleObserver;
005import androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner;
006import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel;
007import dagger.hilt.android.lifecycle.HiltViewModel;
008import dagger.hilt.android.qualifiers.ApplicationContext;
009import edu.cnm.deepdive.appstarter.model.Swarm;
010import edu.cnm.deepdive.appstarter.service.SwarmatronRepository;
011import javax.inject.Inject;
012import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
013@HiltViewModel
014public class SwarmatronViewModel extends ViewModel implements DefaultLifecycleObserver {
015
016  private final SwarmatronRepository repository;
017@Inject
018  SwarmatronViewModel(@ApplicationContext Context context, SwarmatronRepository repository) {
019    this.repository = repository;
020  }
021
022public void spread(float spreadrange){
023    repository.spread(spreadrange);
024  }
025  public void changeWaveform(float waveformSelection) {
026      repository.changeOscillatorWaveform(waveformSelection);
027
028}
029public void changeFilterCutoff(float cutoff) {
030  repository.changeFilterCutoff(cutoff);
031}
032public void addnoise(float noiseamount) {
033    repository.addNoise(noiseamount);}
034public void start(){
035    repository.start();
036}
037public void stop() {
038  repository.stop();
039}
040  public void setCenterPitch(float newPitch) {
041    repository.setCenterPitch(newPitch);
042  }
043
044}
